documents.document: Currently backfilling my to-do list with stuff I wasn’t meant to have done today to make me feel better. You?
(If you’d like to send me any other beautifully designed Christmas things in the post, let me know. I’m in Edinburgh for another week.)
@Dayfold No, sorry! Arrived early last week (I think), but I’ve been away.
@saaamgiles Why. Didn’t. I. Follow. You. Sooner. This. Is. Gold.
@Dayfold I had the fun of opening 1–14 today and now I’m waiting patiently!
In other Christmas post goodness, @Dayfold's advent calendar takes up the entirety of my desk and I love that. https://t.co/sk6h6cvE9v
When you've got an arts uni as a client, you know you're in for a cracking Christmas card. Thanks, @inspiredAUB! https://t.co/XESjtTu21k
@CmonHarris Is the third time this year that a democratic vote can’t be trusted?
@walshpjames OH HELLO
Fancy a new set of wheels? Win this one-of-a-kind bicycle, made for Monzo by Tokyo Bike https://t.co/3NJgUx42r7
@CmonHarris Oh man, I need to check this out. How much was it?
Had a ridiculous fun week down in Bournemouth. Checked out the @Monotype exhibition at @inspiredAUB yesterday. Dope af. https://t.co/Aejcm5PlhP
Trash Christmas Songs top five (yes, this is different): Christina Aguilera — Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas
Forever? For ever ever? For ever ever?
Walked into @SouthCoastRoast and they’re playing Outkast. Damn, I miss this place.
@kpriestley90 Pro tip: Go freelance, then there’s no way to distinguish Mondays because you end up working every day 🙃🙃🙃
@fubarpops YES PLEASE YES
@fubarpops Obviously. You’ve got a way with brownies.
@CmonHarris Hot Buttered Bourbon sounds great (I don’t think I have any atm or I’d offer it for experimenting), yr wrong on biscuits.
@CmonHarris Hang on…the biscuit or the whiskey? Because this sounds like it could be either.
I entered @brewlabcoffee's 12 Days of Christmas Giveaway #blxmas https://t.co/KCkStesJ2D
@saaamgiles there isn't a part of this photo that I don't love.
@fubarpops cool, well, I'm around to get rid of the seconds if that's what you need?
@fubarpops Think you’ve nailed it there, though, tbh.
Worst. Superhero. Ever. https://t.co/enr2vBDlma
@fubarpops https://t.co/KrKGn9JCCf
@fernlzbth I read this as Wizard Dog Club outside work today and got really excited.
Look, Ma! I’m on the internet! https://t.co/hQ1fq93ifd
@iamsamnorman how can YOU be so unbelievably wrong?
@Stephen_Ashby @philipmorris8 1pm. Let’s settle this over a pint.
More special mentions: José Feliciano — Feliz Navidad
@MartynLandi @philipmorris8 Landi — help us out here. #LadPadReviews Christmas hits?
Special mentions: Destiny’s Child — 8 Days of Christmas
@philipmorris8 that better? https://t.co/3WfaRdNNXQ
Alright, alright… 4. The Waitresses — Christmas Wrapping 5. The Pogues — Fairytale of New York
@philipmorris8 Fight me
Top 5 Christmas songs: 1. Jona Lewie — Stop the Cavalry 2. Wham! — Last Christmas 3. Kate Bush — December will be Magic Again 4&5. That’s it
@kpriestley90 SO. MANY. BANGERS.
*LAST CHRISTMAS KLAXON* THIS IS NOT A DRILL. (Still not mad)
@walshpjames It’s no attic.
The place I’m working from this morning is playing The Muppets 12 Days of Christmas and I’m not even mad.
@fubarpops @CmonHarris FFS
@CmonHarris Yes, yes it is.
@CmonHarris Fuck replied to the wrong tweet. The Dog Rates thing, that’s what I meant.
@CmonHarris Are you going to become the go-to for dog news now, Harry? Is this your new thing? I kinda hope so.
You know you’re old when: You catch yourself feeling accomplished over sneaking a Coldplay reference into an article.
Saw The Hotelier last night. Bloody loved it. First time at a gig in Glasgow, too. ★★★★★
2017 resolutions: Tweeting about what @BarackObama is doing and not tweeting about what the new president is doing. For serious.
RT @BarackObama: Hi everybody! Back to the original handle. Is this thing still on? Michelle and I are off on a quick vacation, then we’ll…
RT @fubarpops: I found a 10/10 bridge in sunny Glasgow with @freddiewrites and @plasticniki <3 https://t.co/QSmHh5wP8T
Occasionally I use Facebook’s save feature if I see recipes that I like posted up. One of these is not like the other… https://t.co/AGa3rgupOj
@iamsamnorman I wanna know more, heading over to the MBC chat…
@fubarpops @plasticniki I reckon if you’ve got some form of ID and the booking email you’re grand. SO excited for tomorrow!
@fubarpops Is the ticket shop not in Glasgow? I thought that was part of tomorrow’s fun! I’m in deadline doom today.
@fubarpops I feel like I remember having that option and I chose to pick them at the Box Office. I wish I was going to a ticket shop now.
@fubarpops And we’re all better for it.
This is a pretty good deal. Tempted to spend £50 on books tbh. https://t.co/jdfZ8VRvJn
@fubarpops I mean…they’re not going to care, are they? Surely it’s more for ID. Probably?
RT @McJesse: 😭HOLY SHIT😭 https://t.co/OgCLU22nIw
@fubarpops Tickets Scotland, who say bring the confirmation email and card you used to book with. I can’t remember which card I booked with.
@iamsamnorman 🤞🏻🤞🏻🤞🏻
@fubarpops This sounds like a really messed up GCSE Geography project.

RT @RGA: 6th grade English: Be sparing in your use of exclamation points.
Everyday grownup correspondence: Hello!! It was nice meeting you…
An incredibly brilliant campaign from @MailChimp, here. The detail and execution is spot on. https://t.co/cYA4cp6N6d https://t.co/Z8VX2zvbE3
@BrandNewCopy @walshpjames Right now I still have full control of the Chromecast. The Studio 10 jukebox is playing rap. Lotsa rap.
.@Mr_Bingo absolutely nailed it with this. https://t.co/Igp8fjsAoL https://t.co/ClQTg1DFXN
I link to @sethgodin a lot, but this was a lovely read: Economics is messy https://t.co/wXV1NTsew7
Bonobo's new album is an absolute banger. So much so that it's been on repeat in the office for the last two days. https://t.co/T4JzB9BWCT https://t.co/djpV6iHVOZ
I mean, the screencap alone should be enough to make you watch this: How the inventor of Mario designs a game https://t.co/GnGuybt9Su https://t.co/odZd1gycU1
@nisummers Should’ve got clever and made it loop, but 10 minutes is enough time spent adding Rocky sondtracks to you cycling.
@nisummers Sorry not sorry (requires sound) https://t.co/slJcVgRYim
Do you reckon Chainsmokers are actually using Apple's predictive keyboard to write lyrics? https://t.co/hCEaIXUh6O https://t.co/TY9JETNGK5
@fubarpops Not entirely the same, but on two occasions I was asked if I was @iamdanduke and tried to blag it anyway.
.@sethgodin hits me right in the feels once again: Pavlov's in your pocket https://t.co/KmTyIFVQS8
Do By Friday is by far my favourite new podcast at the moment. It's nerdy and conversational and funny and great. https://t.co/mGulVR3fzN https://t.co/ryAEOI5byb
RT @IndieWire: Great news: Over Half of 2016’s Top Films Pass the Bechdel Test, Says Bustle https://t.co/FrjMKZOmtf https://t.co/JVMGKrkPtN
I love this: In 2017, I’ve turned basic mental health into a competitive game https://t.co/GgIWlaEYNe https://t.co/mEFnAewH71
I almost forgot the  TV has been around for ten years, too. Here's a beautiful piece on its importance… https://t.co/uqMMqpBX0x https://t.co/RdYNnD1I26
@SWilliamThomas For a second I thought you were talking about writing your groom’s speech.
@xohelloimclaire Spare a thought for those of who didn’t even know it was a thing 😭
If you're sad about the Bon Iver EU tour being cancelled, here's a full concert recorded by NPR on YouTube https://t.co/ANYT4gU2Ct https://t.co/ZjtF425UBW
@saaamgiles I am 99% sure she must’ve been the ONLY customer.
@_RosyD So professional! 👍🏻
Found out the oven in the flat has a super quick pre-heat feature and it’s pretty heckin’ life-changing if I’m honest.
@fubarpops You may have a cat/mouse issue, but I’m happy to facilitate a rescue. I once had 'facilitator' in a job title so I think I could.
@fubarpops OH GOSH THIS IS TOO MUCH
Speaking of online security, this DIY Feminist Cybersecurity guide is tops. https://t.co/fGjmYuAmrg https://t.co/tMU2c43SFY
Spent some time over the weekend working through @tommoor's guide to online privacy. Feeling a lot better for it. https://t.co/79oUXSnrwc
You can now order an Uber from Google Maps without having its creep location-tracking app installed. Nice! https://t.co/hdUzkszzdF https://t.co/kJTGU43Vyy
Estonia has made brand guidelines for their entire country. I kinda like it. https://t.co/12OsD5wYUn
Twitter, have you got any great Jazz playlists on Spotify? I really want to listen to Jazz but all the playlists I find are trash.
My ebooks bot didn’t get the memo about post-Brexit Toblerone being trash and that makes me kinda sad. https://t.co/kvzoAsWG7H
Stuff that's never made sense to me: Luggage shops in airport departure lounges. I mean, do they sell? Isn't it a bit late?
@_RosyD Well this seems both weird and annoying!
We just got a bus at the gate that drove us around to the other side of the plane. It was so silly I made a diagram. https://t.co/sAOxe8sEtA
@fubarpops Had a ridiculously good cheese, leek, parsnip and chestnut pie the other day. 10/10
@CharlotteGay92 Warning: The bar there is expensive, but nothing beats a cold beverage in the blue lagoon!
A 2017 reminder: I wrote a book about doing great presentations. If you're applying for new jobs and presenting in interviews, it'll help! https://t.co/SU3IJ1LglZ
Found that setting that turns off 'picked for you' pins on Pinterest and it’s probably the best thing I’ve done all day, tbh.
RT @phlaimeaux: this headline is such a rollercoaster https://t.co/YX4liS3uK8
